name: quackers
description: A console logger for dotnet test with super-duck-powers

scripts.zarro-test: cross-env DOTNET_CORE=1 TEST_INCLUDE=src/Demo/Demo DOTNET_TEST_PREFIXES=Demo:LePrefix. run-s "zarro test-dotnet"
scripts.noisy-demo: dotnet test -l "quackers;verboseSummary=1;summaryStartMarker=::start summary::;summaryCompleteMarker=::end summary::;logprefix=::quackers log::;outputfailuresimmediately=true" src/Demo/Demo.csproj
